gyurix.spigotlib

Class Config

  • java.lang.Object
    • gyurix.spigotlib.Config

  • public class Config
extends java.lang.Object
    Memory represantation of the SpigotLib's configuration (config.yml)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Config.BungeeAPI
      BungeeAPI related settings.
      static class  Config.PlayerFile 

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static boolean allowAllPermsForAuthor
      Allow access to every SpigotLib command for the plugins author, so he could debug other plugins quickly without needing to ask you for changing his perms all the time
      static int animationApiThreads
      Amount of async threads used in AnimationAPI for running animations smoothly
      static Config.BungeeAPI bungee
      BungeeAPI related configurations
      static Debugger debug
      Toggle debug messages in the plugin
      static java.lang.String defaultLang
      Default server language used in language files
      static boolean disablePluginsOnCrash
      Disable plugins on crash
      static boolean disableWeatherChange
      Disable weather changes on the entire server, useful for testing
      static EconomyAPI economy
      EconomyAPI related configurations
      static boolean forceReducedMode
      Disable version sensitive features of SpigotLib, like PacketAPI, ScoreboardAPI for fixing compatibility issues with older server versions
      static boolean phaHook
      Automatically hook to PlaceholderAPI if it's added to the server
      static boolean playerEval
      Allow using Javascript engine for players using /sl commands.
      static Config.PlayerFile playerFile
      Player data storage related settings
      static boolean purgePF
      Purge player data storage in the next server restart
      static boolean silentErrors
      Hide every error handled through the SpigotLib error handler
      static TPSMeter tpsMeter
      TPS meter related settings

    • Field Detail

      • allowAllPermsForAuthor

        public static boolean allowAllPermsForAuthor
        Allow access to every SpigotLib command for the plugins author, so he could debug other plugins quickly without needing to ask you for changing his perms all the time

      • disablePluginsOnCrash

        public static boolean disablePluginsOnCrash
        Disable plugins on crash

      • animationApiThreads

        public static int animationApiThreads
        Amount of async threads used in AnimationAPI for running animations smoothly

      • bungee

        public static Config.BungeeAPI bungee
        BungeeAPI related configurations

      • debug

        public static Debugger debug
        Toggle debug messages in the plugin

      • defaultLang

        public static java.lang.String defaultLang
        Default server language used in language files

      • disableWeatherChange

        public static boolean disableWeatherChange
        Disable weather changes on the entire server, useful for testing

      • economy

        public static EconomyAPI economy
        EconomyAPI related configurations

      • forceReducedMode

        public static boolean forceReducedMode
        Disable version sensitive features of SpigotLib, like PacketAPI, ScoreboardAPI for fixing compatibility issues with older server versions

      • phaHook

        public static boolean phaHook
        Automatically hook to PlaceholderAPI if it's added to the server

      • playerEval

        public static boolean playerEval
        Allow using Javascript engine for players using /sl commands. This feature might be abused by players, and give them unpredictable amount of power, so it's default by default for security

      • playerFile

        public static Config.PlayerFile playerFile
        Player data storage related settings

      • purgePF

        public static boolean purgePF
        Purge player data storage in the next server restart

      • silentErrors

        public static boolean silentErrors
        Hide every error handled through the SpigotLib error handler

      • tpsMeter

        public static TPSMeter tpsMeter
        TPS meter related settings
